name: MyImgur
additional_info:
If anyone can tell me why/how some of the "upvoted" hover-description disappear under the next one under it, please tell. I've already tried the "z-index" etc, to no avail.

One other thing. You have to disable the style if you want to get out of imgur's beta-mode (that too, I'd like to filter/figure that out)

Feel free to use this style as you wish or even sell it. I don't care (although, when I look back one of the style I've made 10yrs ago, and could not login again somehow, until this very evening, if I could have had $0.25 to $1 for each install, even though I can still manage to eat, maybe I would not be in such a low standard and buy a small truck to do work/business/welding, or at least, buy myself a good pizza without it costing my next 2 weeks of grocery/meal)

btw: if you do sell it, you'll have to switch any of imgur's property (icons/links/etc) for the ones you will produce ;)
